verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] meet with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on June 12 in Singapore , the US president announced Thursday on Twitter .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] [ARG1: with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-TMP: on June 12] [ARGM-LOC: in Singapore] , the US president announced Thursday on Twitter .
[ARG1: President Donald Trump will meet with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on June 12 in Singapore] , [ARG0: the US president] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARGM-LOC: on Twitter] .
